trends: There have been 2 other sightings in Edwards AFB
There were no other sightings in Edwards AFB on or around January 11th 2010
divs: Sighting DetailsI work at Edwards AFB and in the morning there was an unusually bright star to the right of the moon, flashing red, blue, green, white. I got out my binoculars and I dont think it was a star, seems other folks have reported the same event from different states. Not sure how long it lasted because I had to get to a meeting. Sure wish I had my telescope and camera set up.
